name: Steady Parent Community
what_it_is: A private group of parents going through the same things you are — active, supportive, and ready to discuss how it really works.
founder_presence: Founders are active and present daily.

cta_copy.title: Hash it out with parents facing this too
cta_copy.body: Next time you'll have parents who tested your exact response and know what came next. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Share the weight with parents in your spiral
cta_copy.body: Next 2 AM panic, you'll have parents who lived your exact worry and know what was real. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Debrief with parents whose kids feel everything
cta_copy.body: Next meltdown, you'll know what five parents did at that exact moment and how the evening went. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Find the words with parents having these conversations
cta_copy.body: Next awkward question, you'll have parents who found the right phrasing for that exact age. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Work through it with parents rewriting the script
cta_copy.body: Next time you catch yourself repeating what was done to you, you'll have people who get it. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Talk it through with parents setting same limits
cta_copy.body: Next time you'll have parents who tested your exact boundary and can tell you if it held. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Compare notes with parents at the same table
cta_copy.body: Next refused meal, you'll know which battles to drop because parents already tested that exact standoff. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Figure it out alongside parents in the fog
cta_copy.body: Next 4 AM feeding, you'll have someone awake who already checked whether this is normal. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Build your approach with parents sorting the noise
cta_copy.body: Next time two experts say opposite things, you'll have parents who tried both and know what held. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Sort the research with parents who read it
cta_copy.body: Next scary headline, you'll have parents who dug into that study and know what it found. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Get through it with parents mid-training now
cta_copy.body: Next regression, you'll have parents one week ahead who can tell you to push through or pause. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Set screen rules with parents fighting this too
cta_copy.body: Next time you cave, you'll have parents who tried your exact rule and know what held. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Figure it out with parents refereeing same fights
cta_copy.body: Next blowup, you'll know whether to step in or wait because someone tried both with your gap. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Get through tonight with parents fighting same bedtime
cta_copy.body: Next curtain call, you'll have parents who solved your exact stalling tactic and know what stuck. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Talk it through with parents watching this too
cta_copy.body: Next time your kid sits alone, you'll have parents who navigated this and found what helped. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Breathe with parents raising kids just like yours
cta_copy.body: Next time nobody around you gets it, you'll have parents who raise the same kid and do. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Work on it with parents managing same triggers
cta_copy.body: Next time the yell builds, you'll have parents who mapped that trigger and found what stops it. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Debrief with parents who had that same day
cta_copy.body: Next public meltdown, you'll have a move that worked for someone whose kid did the same thing. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Stay connected with parents navigating this distance
cta_copy.body: Next eye roll, you'll have parents who pushed and parents who backed off and know which worked. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Get through it with parents facing this upheaval
cta_copy.body: Next time your kid falls apart, you'll have parents who came out the other side with answers. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Compare notes with parents who got your result
cta_copy.body: Next time someone questions your approach, you'll have parents who got your result to back you up. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Swap tactics with parents running the same bedtime
cta_copy.body: Tomorrow night when stalling starts, you'll know what worked for parents who handle bedtime your way. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Talk it through with parents rewriting your script
cta_copy.body: Next time you catch yourself mid-reaction, you'll have parents who spotted the same pattern and changed course. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Compare spirals with parents wired the same way
cta_copy.body: Next 3 AM spiral, you'll have parents who worry your way and know what was worth it. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: See how parents with your language connect
cta_copy.body: Next time connection falls flat, you'll have parents who show love your way and know what lands. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Unpack your result with parents closing that gap
cta_copy.body: Next time you wonder what your kid actually thinks, you'll have parents who closed that same gap. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: See how parents with different strengths cover yours
cta_copy.body: When your strength falls short, you'll have parents who scored differently and can show you another way. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Debrief 2 AM with parents who get it
cta_copy.body: Next time you're questioning everything at 2 AM, you'll have parents who made the same call. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Compare eras with parents in the same phase
cta_copy.body: Next time you feel stuck, you'll have parents living the same era who know what shifts. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Hash it out with your kind of team
cta_copy.body: Next time your co-parent handles it differently, you'll have parents who navigated the same mismatch. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Get real timelines from parents at this stage
cta_copy.body: Next time you second-guess the signs, you'll have parents whose toddler scored the same to ask. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Talk it through with parents prepping for September
cta_copy.body: Next time September looms, you'll have parents who closed the same readiness gaps and know what mattered. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Get the playbook from parents who just started
cta_copy.body: Next time your baby gags, you'll have parents who started solids that week to ask. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Compare notes with parents dropping the nap too
cta_copy.body: Next 4 PM meltdown, you'll have parents who dropped the nap at the same age and survived. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Talk it through with parents making this call
cta_copy.body: Next invitation, you'll have parents who said yes and parents who waited and know how both went. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Hear from parents who chose both ways
cta_copy.body: Next time this keeps you up, you'll have parents who went for it and parents who waited. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Recharge with parents running on the same level
cta_copy.body: Next time you hit empty with hours of parenting left, you'll have parents who found what recharges. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Swap screen rules with parents at your score
cta_copy.body: Next time you cave on the tablet, you'll have parents at your score level to ask. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Discuss your child's score with parents tracking growth
cta_copy.body: Next time you wonder if a reaction is normal, you'll have parents whose kids scored the same. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Compare notes with parents building the same confidence
cta_copy.body: Next time your kid hangs back, you'll have parents whose child scored the same to ask. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Unpack it with parents rebuilding the same openness
cta_copy.body: Next time your kid shuts down, you'll have parents who rebuilt that trust and know what shifted. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: See how parents adapted the same routine
cta_copy.body: Next time a step stops working, you'll have parents who built similar routines to ask. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: Compare chore lists with parents at this age
cta_copy.body: Next time your kid refuses yesterday's easy chore, you'll have same-age parents who found what sticks. We are there with you daily too.

cta_copy.title: See what worked when parents tried these tools
cta_copy.body: Next meltdown when the breathing card gets thrown, you'll have parents who found what actually works. We are there with you daily too.

name: Beyond Hitting
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for responding to hitting, biting, and physical aggression at every age.

cta_copy.title: The Beyond Hitting course will teach you what to do
cta_copy.body: You'll respond to biting, hitting, and throwing with a clear next step instead of grabbing their arm and hoping for the best.

name: Childhood Anxiety
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for helping your child manage worry, fear, and avoidance behaviors.

cta_copy.title: The Childhood Anxiety course will help you tell fear from habit
cta_copy.body: You'll know when to gently push past avoidance and when to sit with your child in it, without second-guessing yourself all night.

name: Big Feelings
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for helping kids experience and process intense emotions safely.

cta_copy.title: The Big Feelings course will show you how to stay close
cta_copy.body: You'll stop bracing for the next emotional wave and start letting your child feel things without rushing to fix or shut it down.

name: Body Safety Conversations
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for age-appropriate body safety and consent conversations.

cta_copy.title: The Body Safety Conversations course will give you the words
cta_copy.body: You'll have age-right language for boundaries, consent, and private parts ready before the moment catches you off guard.

name: Breaking the Cycle
what_it_is: Audio lessons and guided exercises for identifying and changing inherited parenting patterns.

cta_copy.title: The Breaking the Cycle course will help you catch the pattern
cta_copy.body: You'll recognize your inherited reactions before they land on your kid, and swap in responses you actually chose on purpose.

name: Discipline Without Punishment
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for setting firm limits without punishment, threats, or yelling.

cta_copy.title: The Discipline Without Punishment course will show you what does
cta_copy.body: You'll set real limits your child actually respects, without counting to three, threatening consequences, or losing your voice.

name: Peaceful Mealtimes
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for ending mealtime battles using the division of responsibility approach.

cta_copy.title: The Peaceful Mealtimes course will walk you through what works
cta_copy.body: You'll put food on the table without begging, bribing, or tracking bites, and your kid will actually start trying new things.

name: New Parent Survival
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for surviving and enjoying the first year without losing yourself.

cta_copy.title: The New Parent Survival course will show you what actually matters
cta_copy.body: You'll stop doom-scrolling milestones at 3 AM and start trusting that you and your baby are figuring this out fine.

name: Intentional Parenting
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for building a parenting approach that fits your actual family.

cta_copy.title: The Intentional Parenting course will help you build your own approach
cta_copy.body: You'll stop borrowing pieces from five different philosophies and start parenting from a framework that fits your real family.

name: The Science of Parenting
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated breakdowns of the research behind common parenting advice.

cta_copy.title: The Science of Parenting course will show you what's proven
cta_copy.body: You'll know which popular parenting claims hold up to research and which ones you can safely ignore without guilt.

name: Potty Training
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated day-by-day guides for stress-free potty training on your child's timeline.

cta_copy.title: The Potty Training course will walk you through it day by day
cta_copy.body: You'll follow a clear daily plan that works on your child's actual readiness, not a weekend boot camp based on someone else's kid.

name: Screen Sanity
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for managing screens without constant fights or guilt.

cta_copy.title: The Screen Sanity course will help you set limits that hold
cta_copy.body: You'll hand over the tablet and take it back without negotiations, meltdowns, or that sinking feeling you're ruining their brain.

name: Sibling Harmony
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for reducing sibling conflict and building genuine connection between your kids.

cta_copy.title: The Sibling Harmony course will show you what's underneath the fights
cta_copy.body: You'll stop refereeing twenty conflicts a day and start watching your kids solve problems together, at least the small ones.

name: Sleep Solutions
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for building sleep routines that stick, without cry-it-out or co-sleeping guilt.

cta_copy.title: The Sleep Solutions course will help you build a routine that holds
cta_copy.body: You'll finish bedtime in a predictable window and spend your evening doing something other than lying on their floor again.

name: Social Skills
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for building your child's social confidence and friendship skills.

cta_copy.title: The Social Skills course will show you what to do
cta_copy.body: You'll watch your child walk into a group and find their way in, instead of hovering three feet away feeding them lines.

name: Spirited Kids
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for parenting high-intensity children without breaking either of you.

cta_copy.title: The Spirited Kids course will teach you to work with the intensity
cta_copy.body: You'll stop trying to dial your child down and start channeling that energy so both of you survive the day intact.

name: The Calm Parent
what_it_is: Audio lessons and guided exercises for staying regulated when your kids push every button you have.

cta_copy.title: The Calm Parent course will teach you to catch yourself in time
cta_copy.body: You'll notice your own escalation before the yelling starts and have a real move to make instead of white-knuckling through it.

name: The Tantrum Toolkit
what_it_is: Step-by-step audio lessons and illustrated guides for every tantrum scenario, from grocery store meltdowns to bedtime battles.

cta_copy.title: The Tantrum Toolkit course will give you a plan for every scenario
cta_copy.body: You'll walk into the grocery store knowing exactly what to do when it starts, instead of abandoning a full cart again.

name: Parenting Teens
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for staying connected through adolescence without becoming the enemy.

cta_copy.title: The Parenting Teens course will show you how to stay connected
cta_copy.body: You'll keep the door open through eye rolls and slammed doors, and your teenager will actually walk back through it sometimes.

name: Life Transitions
what_it_is: Audio lessons and illustrated guides for helping kids through major life changes with less anxiety.

cta_copy.title: The Life Transitions course will help you steady your child through it
cta_copy.body: You'll guide your kid through the move, the new school, or the divorce with words that actually land instead of cheerful reassurance that doesn't.
